item.title: Climate Scholar
item.description: Worked with NOAA scientist to analyze climate data, automatically generate relevant figures/plots, and ultimately contribute science to the North-American Multi-Model Ensemble, as hosted by Princeton University’s Department of Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences. Check out this newsletter from Princeton University featuring my work here.
